name: My Dad Santa
description:
An awkward conversation with your dad...who just so happens to be Santa!

Play as Blitzen, Santa's adopted reindeer son. Make choices that affect the conversation, and uncover a funny, emotional story in the process!

Use the space bar or mouse button. Play the game multiple times to see everything.

Just keep in mind -- nobody ever said saying the right thing would be easy. I mean, technically, you don't even have to be present in the conversation.

That's what smartphones were invented for.

Estimated play time: 15 minutes per playthrough

Made with Unity 2020.1 and Fungus.

WRITING, PROGRAMMING, ART, & MUSIC by Landon X. Jenkins

ADDITIONAL SOUND EFFECTS by zapsplat.com

Game is family-friendly, appropriate for all ages.

This game was originally created for the Extra Credits 2018 Holiday Game Jam. Check out the original here: https://happycrazywild.itch.io/i-saw-mom-kissing-santa-claus-jam
